definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

pinyin: bu4 ke3 zai4 sheng1 zi1 yuan2

sentences.english: Their design is described in the Journal of Renewable and Sustainable Energy. [Bharat Raj Singh and Onkar Singh, http://bit.ly/bFd3dO]
sentences.chinese: 他們的這項設計發表在《可再生與可持續能源》上。

sentences.english: And it was concluded that the renewable capability of cassava-based ethanol was better than that of gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 得到木薯乙醇燃料可再生性優於汽油的結論。

sentences.english: And steel is the most recycled material.
sentences.chinese: 鋼鐵幾乎是其中最可再生的材料。

sentences.english: Biodiesel becomes diesel's alternative fuel because of its environmental protection and renewable ability.
sentences.chinese: 生物柴油以其環保性和可再生性成爲柴油的替代燃料。

sentences.english: Lignocellulose is the most abundant renewable resource in the world .
sentences.chinese: 木質纖維素是地球上數量最豐富的可再生性資源。

sentences.english: The fibers are taken from the ocean, resource-rich renewable fiber biodegradable.
sentences.chinese: 該纖維取自海洋，資源豐富可再生，纖維可降解。

sentences.english: Dixon said the company used products from sustainbly farmed forests in Canada.
sentences.chinese: Dixon說公司使用的原料來自加拿大可再生林場。

sentences.english: Biodiesel attracts notice all around the world because of its cleanness and reproducibility .
sentences.chinese: 生物柴油的可再生性和清潔性引起了世界各國的重視。

sentences.english: It is a kind of national degradative fiber which is made from regenerative superior TCF pulp.
sentences.chinese: 以可再生的優質TCF漿粕爲原料，可自然降解。

sentences.english: The shakuhachi is environmentally sound. It is made entirely of renewable resources.
sentences.chinese: 尺八是大地之音，它全然以可再生的材質所製作。

sentences.english: Unlike petroleum, jatropha oil is renewable and biodegradable.
sentences.chinese: 與石油不同，麻瘋樹油是可再生和生物可降解的。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 is the optimal exploitation policy for the renewable biological resources.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是可再生生物資源的最優開發與利用。

sentences.english: Systematize a popular service into a reproducible product.
sentences.chinese: 將一個受歡迎的服務系統化，做成一件可再生的產品。

sentences.english: Other recycled materials were used to make the decorations and accessories around the house and playhouse.
sentences.chinese: 其它可再生材料用做房屋和遊樂室的室內裝飾配件。

sentences.english: Let us increase the use of renewable power and emissions-free nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們增加可再生動力和無排放核動力的使用。

pinyin: bu4 ke3 zai4 sheng1 zi1 yuan2
qu3 zhi1 bu4 jin4 , yong4 zhi1 bu4 jie2
